synopsis.text: Hatena's captivating melody "Koe Dake ga" receives a visual interpretation in a music video directed by the talented Yoshihito Katou. This enchanting tune not only serves as the second ending theme for the popular anime series Dr. STONE: STONE WARS, but also continues the narrative from Hatena's previously released music video for the song "Yume ja Nai." Immerse yourself in this mesmerizing blend of music and animation, as the haunting lyrics of "Koe Dake ga" weave a tale that complements the thrilling world of Dr. STONE: STONE WARS.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
